<[silence:3600]>

"Jungle" comes from Sanskrit jaṅgala ("uncultivated land") <[silence:1200]>
Entered English via Hindi in the 1700s, describing dense tropical forests <[silence:1200]>
Now evokes biodiversity, humidity, and untamed wilderness <[silence:1200]>
